Package jointyc.analysis.semantic.exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AnnotationException
    Thrown when an interpretation method is annotated for a non-existing token (terminal or non-terminal) with the TerminalToken or with the NonTerminalToken annotations.
    AxiomBufferClearException
    Thrown when the interpreter method of the axiom has been annotated with the NoBufferClear annotation.
    MutuallyExclusiveInterpretationsException  
    NonTerminalReplicationException
    Usually thrown when the same NonTerminalToken annotation is repeated for the same token on the same method.
    SemanticException
    Usually thrown when an interpretation error occurs (For example, considering some strongly typed language, the type checking reveals an error)
    TerminalReplicationException
    Usually thrown when the same TerminalToken annotation is repeated for the same token on the same method.
    UnknownParameterException
